title: Customer Engineer, Cloud Security
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**  

* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 10 years of experience in in selling security consulting services in the capacity of a technical business engineer in a cloud computing environment, or equivalent experience in a similar customer-facing role (e.g., within a professional services, solutions architect, or systems engineering team).
* Experience in cybersecurity technical solutions: SIEM/SOAR (EDR, XDR), Threat Intelligence (threat detection, malware intelligence, attack surface management), Cloud Security (CSPM, CWPP, CNAPP, or identity and access management systems).


**Preferred qualifications:**  

* Certification in the Cloud or Security industry.
* Experience in either of these market sectors: retail, healthcare, energy or chemicals.
* Knowledge of product and solution market trends in the cybersecurity industry (e.g., ransomware, attack frameworks, zero trust, etc.).
* Ability to speak publicly and deliver technical presentations.
* Ability to travel up to 50% of the time as required.


About the job
  
  

The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are developed for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.
  
Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

* Work with Security, Business and Google Cloud teams to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand customer technical and compliance objections, and develop strategies to resolve technical blockers.
* Work with all Google Cloud Security products to demonstrate and validate solution benefits in customer and partner environments.
* Support Google Cloud Security opportunities and relationships, own technical aspects of solutions, deliver technical presentations, product and solution briefings, proofs-of-concepts and demos to customers, partners, and stakeholders.
* Prepare and deliver product messaging in an effort to highlight Google's solutions value proposition using techniques including presentations, product demonstrations, white papers, trial management, and response documents.
* Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events where applicable.


Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See alsoGoogle's EEO Policy andEEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing ourAccommodations for Applicants form.
company_description: Our mission is to organize the world’s information and make it universally accessible and useful.

title: HIL Validation Specialist
description:
### **Required Skills**


* MSc in Software Engineering/Electrical & Electronics Engineering or equivalent experience through years of practice.
* Relevant experience in software system testing and HIL rigs testing.
* Understanding of HIL rigs with knowledge of signal configuration, communication, diagnostics and software-download.
* Knowledge of Vector Canoe and vTestStudio.
* Knowledge of CAN, LIN, Ethernet, XCP communication protocols.
* Knowledge in Test case automation with vTestStudio and simulation automation with CAPL and C# scripting.
* Comfortable working in a cross-functional organization to support teams in increasing automation coverage by adding the right enablers in test frameworks.
* Problem solving mind set and good at fault tracing on HIL rigs.
* Fluent in English and can communicate effectively with all types of stakeholders.
* Knowledge of Software Development, Verification and Validation Experience from SW platform development, including middleware.


**Desired Skills**


* **Skills with CI/CD tools:** Jenkins, Gerrit/GIT, Artifactory.
* Skills in Python, Bash, Linux.
* Good knowledge with CI/CD environment: Cloud/Azure, Docker.
* Verification in vehicles at system or functional level or experience from test automation.
* Driving License ‘B’.

title: BDR Internship - Launch Your Sales & Business Development Career
description:
- Devoteam G Cloud is an award-winning Google Cloud partner renowned for its innovative and collaborative culture. With a team of over 600 Google Cloud experts, we deliver cutting-edge solutions to businesses across the globe. Our Stockholm office is a dynamic hub for technological advancement, and we're looking for driven individuals to join our growing team.

  
Are you eager to kickstart your career in sales and business development? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment and enjoy connecting with people? This BDR internship offers an unparalleled opportunity to gain hands-on experience at the forefront of the technology industry.


**As a BDR Intern, you will:**

* **Drive business growth:** Play a key role in identifying and qualifying potential clients, generating leads, and contributing to the company's sales pipeline.
* **Develop key sales skills:** Master the art of outreach, including crafting compelling cold emails and conducting engaging cold calls to connect with prospects.
* **Become a trusted advisor:** Build relationships with potential clients, understand their business challenges, and position Devoteam G Cloud's solutions effectively.
* **Collaborate with sales professionals:** Work closely with our experienced sales team to develop and execute targeted outreach strategies.
* **Contribute to sales strategy:** Participate in sales meetings, contribute to account planning sessions, and gain insights into the sales process from lead generation to close.
* **Gain market intelligence:** Research target industries and identify key decision-makers to expand Devoteam G Cloud's reach.

  
* Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in business, marketing, or a related field.
* Exceptional communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills.
* A strong desire to learn and a passion for sales and business development.
* Self-motivated and results-oriented with a proactive approach.
* Interest in technology and cloud computing is a plus.

  
- **What You Gain:**


	* **Comprehensive sales experience:** Gain valuable experience across all stages of the sales cycle, from lead generation to relationship building and closing deals.
	* **Mentorship from sales leaders:** Learn from experienced sales professionals and receive guidance to develop your skills and advance your career.
	* **Networking opportunities:** Build connections with industry leaders and expand your professional network within the technology sector.
	* **Cutting-edge knowledge:** Gain insight into the world of cloud computing and the latest Google Cloud technologies.
	* **Launchpad for your career:** This internship provides a strong foundation for a successful career in sales and business development within a dynamic and growing company.**Additional Information:**

This is an unpaid internship opportunity based in our Stockholm office.


**Apply Now!**

Submit your CV along with a motivational letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for Devoteam G Cloud and your aspirations for a career in sales and business development.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Security Strategist (EMEA North)
description:
**Security Specialist (EMEA North)*****Open to locations in Sweden, Norway, Denmark or Finland***
-------------------------------------------------------------


Splunk is here to build a safer and more resilient digital world. The world's leading enterprises use our unified security and observability platform to keep their digital systems secure and reliable. While customers love our technology, it's our people that make Splunk stand out as an amazing career destination and why we've won so many awards as a best place to work. If you become a Splunker, we want your whole, authentic self, what we call your "million data points". So bring your work experience, problem-solving skills and talent, of course, but also bring your joy, your passion and all the things that make you vary. We look at talent, values and character when hiring.**Role summary**
----------------


Your primary focus as a Security Strategist is on what's new and what’s next to stay ahead of customer, market and technology trends. You will be part of a small team of technical and domain security subject matter experts that will identify and incubate emerging and strategic Security use cases and solutions that will unify, advance and expand the value of Splunk products for our EMEA North customers with an increased focus on the Nordics region. You will work closely with theater partners, but report up through the Global organization. You will be responsible for driving adoption and success metrics for emerging and incubation-stage security use cases and solutions for your assigned theater and region, while also fulfilling global responsibilities to help evangelize and advance the Splunk Security brand, product and GTM strategy.
Your role will require you to interface cross-functionally at both theater and global levels with teams across sales, technical sales, customer success, partners, product marketing and product management.**What you'll get to do!**
--------------------------

* Develop and refine emerging security use cases for Splunk products that reflect priority customer challenges, market trends, the evolving threat landscape and unique business opportunities.
* Develop and test new maturity models, white papers, programs, workshops, demos, POVs, enablement content, and thought leadership content to showcase and accelerate adoption of emerging information security use cases and solutions.
* Represent Splunk Security internally as a security GTM stakeholder in product roadmap, launch planning, customer initiative development in strategic growth areas for our customers and our business in security.
* Evangelize Splunk Security vision, strategy and roadmap at industry events and with global customers and partners.
* Mentor security talent both within our team and across the SE and Solution Architect community at Splunk as we look to continue to increase and expand the profile of security.
* Partner with regional teams to localize global content and strategy to region-specific sales plays, enablement content, account targeting strategies and channel strategies for incubation-stage use cases and solutions with the in-theater technical sales and sales teams.

**Qualifications**
------------------

* 7+ years of technical sales, product or practitioner experience in the security industry.
* Experience with modern security technologies and their place in an organization's architecture, e.g., SIEM, SOAR, and UEBA.
* Clear and concise communicator being comfortable presenting publicly to large audiences or one on one with senior executives.
* Experience in driving complex security sales cycles across EMEA.
* Demonstrated knowledge of current threats, high-visibility security events, and trends in the marketplace.
* Familiarity with current security data sources spanning on-premises, hybrid, & multi-cloud (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) including the security detection methodologies they offer.
* Familiarity with common industry frameworks and concepts like MITRE ATT&CK, CSC CIS, LMKC, OTel, DORA, etc.
* Willingness and ability to work cross-functionally across a globally-dispersed remote organization with minimal supervision.
* Willingness to travel for industry and marketing events, customer and functional meetings.
* Based in Sweden, Denmark or Norway.

**Splunk is an Equal Opportunity Employer:**
--------------------------------------------


At Splunk, we believe creating a culture of belonging isn’t just the right thing to do; it’s also the smart thing. We prioritize diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging to ensure our employees are supported to bring their best, most authentic selves to work where they can thrive. Qualified applicants receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, age, physical or mental disability or medical condition, genetic information, veteran status, or any other consideration made unlawful by federal, state, or local laws. We consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.
company_description: Splunk helps make organizations more digitally resilient. Leading organizations use our unified security and observability platform to keep their digital systems secure and reliable.

title: Marketing Automation Specialist
description:
Are you an ambitious, methodical marketer who is passionate to learn and test new techniques? Would you like to work for an industry market leader? We are currently in search of a Marketing Automation Specialist for Wolters Kluwer in Gothenburg. Intrigued? Explore the details below to learn more about this exciting opportunity.  

  

Wolters Kluwer Tax & Accounting Scandinavia is a leading technology business that provides software to professional accountants and tax advisors, from sole practitioners to many of the leading accounting practices in Sweden. Essentially, we are a FinTech business, and our people love ideas, innovation, and creativity. If this sounds like you, you should get in touch.
In this role you will be based in our centrally located HQ in Gothenburg, and you will be reporting to the Marketing Director Europe North. You will join a dynamic and engaged marketing team offering market leading products. You will be a part of an exciting journey in an industry transforming its complete offering to cloud-based solutions. You will work in a team of dedicated, professional, and friendly colleagues.
Responsibilities:* Manage our Automation Tool, Pardot, ensuring day to day maintenance, monitoring and best practices are applied across the team.
* Build, test, launch and optimize campaigns including email template setup, campaign setup, event promotion, ABM, data management, A/B testing, scheduling tracking and measuring campaign performance.
* Create and maintenance of Nurturing Campaigns in support of our marketing strategy.
* Monitor and Report on Email Marketing Performance.
* Stay up to date with latest automation techniques and propose new ways of improving marketing campaigns to the rest of the team, always with a test & learn approach.
* Monitor our Lead Scoring Program (BANT) and propose new ways to improve it depending on its conversion rate and Sales funnel velocity.
* Create and maintain landing pages and forms in Pardot and Sitecore.
* Create and maintain marketing reports, segments, and contact lists in Salesforce.


About you:  

We are looking for a passionate marketing automation specialist who shares our values and wants to be part of our success story. If that sounds like you, then hopefully you will also be able to demonstrate the following:* A proven track record of Automation knowledge and hands-on experience in automation execution (minimum 2 years) using any bespoke automation tool, if Pardot it’s a bonus
* Knowledge of email marketing strategy and optimization techniques
* Knowledge of Salesforce, Segmentation & Demand Generation
* Broad knowledge of marketing campaign metrics
* Analytical mindset and critical thinking
* Strong organizational skills demonstrated through experience in delivering ongoing execution of digital marketing activity.
* Action-orientated and able to adapt to rapidly changing business requirements while thinking creatively and exploiting business opportunities.
* Effective team player with a can-do attitude, who can work on tight deadlines and across multiple workstreams.
* Strong communications skills in both English and at least one Scandinavian language.


Our offer:
We believe in rewarding our team with a competitive benefits package, including a collective agreement that covers occupational pension, health benefits, food vouchers, and more. We offer flexible working hours and flexible working policy (2 days a week in the office, 3 days a week from home) and recognize the importance of work-life balance, providing extra days off and early finish times during the summer.
At Wolters Kluwer, you will be part of a team of dedicated, professional, and friendly colleagues. We foster an open and inclusive work environment where collaboration is key.
We believe in supporting personal and professional growth. Our core values—Win as a Team, Make It Better, Customer Focus, and Aim High and Deliver—guide everything we do. Here, your contributions will be recognized, and you’ll have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact.
If this sounds like you, please send your resume in English.
#LI-Hybrid

title: Controller Supply Chain
description:
Vill du hjälpa till att skapa förutsättningar för våra medarbetare att fatta rätt beslut som leder oss till att nå våra mål? Brinner du för att analysera och att identifiera förbättringar? Vill du dessutom arbeta tillsammans med ett team av engagerade och drivna kollegor? Då är det dig vi söker!


Rollen är en utökning av organisationen vilket innebär att du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med en erfaren Supply Chain controller och i ett team av totalt 6 controllers. Tillsammans stöttar ni verksamheten med analys och i att ta datadrivna beslut.


Organisatoriskt tillhör du Ekonomiavdelningen och rapporterar till Ekonomichef. Tjänsten är placerad i Källby.

### **Hos oss får du**

* Vara delaktig - i att förbättra arbetssätten för controllerteamet och verksamheten samt fungera som stöd kring analys, uppföljning, nyckeltal och målarbete.
* Möjlighet att påverka – Genom att visualisera data möjliggör du datadrivna beslut och har därmed en viktig roll i företagets måluppfyllnad.
* Arbete tillsammans – Controllerteamet arbetar tillsammans för att stötta verksamheten men med olika huvudansvar verksamhetsmässigt. Ni arbetar även nära Business Intelligence utvecklare för att utveckla våra BI-lösningar, skapa interaktiva dashboards och rapporter samt säkerställa att rätt data når rätt personer vid rätt tidpunkt.
* Verksamhetsnära arbete – All mat lagas i Källby och alla beslut tas i Källby vilket gör att möjligheten till att arbeta nära verksamheten är stor.
* Utvecklande arbetsmiljö – Köket i Källby står aldrig stilla och möjligheten till utveckling inom området är stor. Genom myrstegsmetoden gör vi kontinuerligt små framsteg varje dag, hela tiden.
* Långsiktigt arbete – Familjeföretaget Dafgårds vill fortsätta sin verksamhet i Källby i ytterligare 85 år. Beslut tas med långsiktigheten i fokus.
* Arbeta i världsledande system i framkant - Med SAP som vårt affärssystem och SAP Analytics Cloud som Business Intelligences system, strävar vi alltid efter att ligga i framkant i syfte att säkerställa rätt affärsbeslut.

### **Dina arbetsuppgifter**

* Tillgängliggöra och visualisera data i rapporter i syfte att säkerställa rätt beslutsstöd i verksamheten
* Fungera som stöd till verksamheten vid analys, uppföljning och budgetering
* Analysera och följa upp trender samt signalera förbättringsmöjligheter och förluster i närtid
* Analysera måluppfyllnad
* Övervaka och analysera lagernivåer med syfte att skapa kontroll över värdering och kapitalbindning
* Följa kostnadsutfallet inom området samt säkerställa rätt interbokföring
* Analysera måluppfyllnad
* Sammanhållande i budgetprocessen inom området

### **Egenskaper och kvalifikationer**


För oss är det viktigt att du har ett intresse för kunden och affären samt en vilja att sätta dig in i och förstå hur vår mat lagas och hur varubehoven uppstår och flödar genom företaget. Som person ser vi att du är proaktiv och tar egenansvar i ständig förbättring. Arbetet kräver att du är analytisk och kan arbeta med detaljer, men även se helheten. Vi lägger stor vikt vid ett kundfokuserat arbetssätt och att du har förmågan att förmedla ekonomiska insikter på ett enkelt och begripligt sätt för verksamheten.


Du är utbildad ekonom, på högskole- eller universitetsnivå och vi värdesätter tidigare arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbete. Vi värdesätter även erfarenhet av arbete i Analysverktyg och i Microsoft Office.

### **Ansökan**


Välkommen med din ansökan genom att klicka på "skicka ansökan" i denna annons. Ansökningar som kommer in via brev eller e-mail tas tyvärr inte med i rekryteringsprocessen. Vi rekryterar löpande, så tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Vid eventuella frågor skicka gärna ett mejl till Ekonomichef, Evelina Årlid: evelina.arlid@dafgard.se.


Sista ansökningsdag: 30 november 2024


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Konsultuppdrag | Migration Lead
description:
Profile/Role: Migration Lead  

Expected years of experience: 7+ years  

Start date: 2025-01-07  

End date: 2025-10-30  

Location/remote availability: 3 days onsite at the Solna office  

  

Target rate 875 sek/h  

  

**About the assignment:**  

* Lead the migration strategy, planning, and execution for a large-scale IT transformation, ensuring seamless data and application transitions.
* Collaborate closely with internal teams, stakeholders, and third-party vendor to design a robust migration framework.
* Analyze current systems, processes, and data environments to create detailed migration roadmaps.
* Ensure that all migrations align with business- and program- goals, minimizing disruptions and ensuring operational continuity.
* Manage cross-functional teams through each phase of the migration, addressing challenges and mitigating risks.
* Provide expert guidance on best practices for system integration, cloud migration, and data governance.
* Oversee post-migration validation and performance optimization to ensure successful outcomes.

  

**Requirements**:
  

  

* Proven experience as a Migration Lead or Consultant in large-scale IT transformation programs.
* Extensive experience in systems migration (applications, infrastructure, or cloud) and data migration projects.
* Strong knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, and/or Google Cloud) and enterprise IT landscapes.
* Expertise in project management with the ability to deliver within time, budget, and quality constraints.
* Exceptional problem-solving and leadership skills with a focus on delivering high-impact results.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Experience from banking / financing industry – previous experience from Custody is an advantage.
**Om oss**

*Senterprise Consulting är ett eget affärsområde inom Senterprise Sverige och är en ledande oberoende förmedlare av frilansande konsulter.*  

*Genom aktiv headhunting och search och en omfattande teknisk förståelse hjälper Senterprise Sverige de främsta arbetsgivarna att hitta de mest lämpade kandidaterna för både anställning och konsultbehov.*  

*Läs vidare på* *www.senterprise.se*

title: Senior Logistics Technician
description:
As a Microsoft Senior Logistics Technician (Knows in Microsoft as a Snr Data Center Inventory & Asset Technician (DIAT)), you will prioritize and assign ticketed work to technicians on the team, provide guidance on inbound/outbound logistics tasks, and ensure that inventory balances are accurate. This opportunity will allow you to demonstrate your expertise in standard processes and procedures for Inventory & Asset Management and develop skills around mentorship of peer technicians accelerating your career growth in the process.  

Microsoft’s Cloud Operations & Innovation (CO+I) is the engine that powers our cloud services. As a CO+I DIAT, you will perform a key role in delivering the core infrastructure and foundational technologies for Microsoft's online services including Bing, Office 365, Xbox, OneDrive, and the Microsoft Azure platform. As a group, CO+I is focused on the personal and professional development of all employees and offers training and opportunities including Career Rotation Programs, Diversity & Inclusion training and events, and professional certifications.  

Our infrastructure is comprised of a large global portfolio of more than 300+ Data Centers in 32 countries and millions of servers. Our foundation is built upon and managed by a team of subject matter experts working to support services for more than 1 billion customers and 20 million businesses in over 90 countries worldwide.  

With environmental sustainability and optimization at the forefront of our data center design and operations, we continue to grow and evolve as we meet the ever-changing business demands that hold Microsoft as a world-class cloud provider.  

Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.**Responsibilities**
--------------------

**Responsibilities*** Prioritize ticketing queues, work to resolve escalations, and clear blocking issues to enable continued delivery of Inventory and Asset Management (IAM) activities.
* Provide task specific guidance to a team of technicians responsible for preparing and executing incoming/outgoing deliveries and documenting inbound/outbound packages (e.g. purchase order [PO] receiving, Rack Movement Supervisor [RMS] activities).
* Coordinate with external stakeholders including third-party warehouses, Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) vendors, and suppliers as necessary to facilitate inbound and outbound deliveries.
* Perform assigned tasks and escalate issues during high-volume work activity or escalation-based situations.
* Leverage process knowledge and technical skills to resolve escalations (or further escalate if needed), clear blocking issues, and may enable on site and/or remote data center support activities.
* Maintain a strong stakeholder focus to improve quality and ensure that the customer receives the highest return on their investment.
* Ensure teams maintain and perform steps required to keep the inventory balance accurate.
* Act as the Subject Matter Expert (SME) about the Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) warranty process ensuring teams process failed vendor hardware devices using tools and processes RMAs.
* Manage schedule of DBD destruction or shredding in partnership with senior leadership and ensure team is following all processes and procedures to perform DBD destruction.
* Attend, conduct, or assist in conducting daily safety briefings, completes required safety training, provides guidance to technicians to facilitate compliance with safety procedures (e.g., Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) usage, rack moving, heavy-equipment usage, lifting, ladder/rolling stair use).Seek out opportunities to contribute to workstreams and evolve existing workstream processes, services, and solutions toward greater simplification and automation.
* Embody our culture and values.

**Qualifications**
------------------

**Required Qualifications**
* High School Diploma AND experience within warehouse/supply chain in an information technology (IT) environment, inventory management, retail, warehouse management, or a related field
* + OR equivalent experience.

**Background Check Requirements:**  

Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include, but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings:* Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.


While not required, we also look for the following***Preferred*** **Qualifications*****:**** Experience in warehouse/supply chain in an information technology (IT) environment, IT, and/or logistics, operating heavy-load movement equipment (e.g., forklift, pallet jacks, chassis lifts) for a large corporation
	+ OR equivalent experience.

  


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Senior MES Architect
description:
**World leader in engineering and R&D services, Capgemini Engineering combines its broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software to support the convergence of the physical and digital worlds. Coupled with the capabilities of the rest of the Group, it helps clients to accelerate their journey towards Intelligent Industry. Capgemini Engineering has more than 55,000 engineer and scientist team members in over 30 countries across sectors including Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.**

**Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of €22 billion.**

**We’re looking for a Senior MES Architect who can bring value and work as a key person in our digital manufacturing, especially MES projects. You will act as a creator of architectural design, defining system requirements and use cases to address overall business requirements. You will provide industry best practices in IT/OT convergence and MES solution architecture and ensure that the technical solution remains aligned to business requirements. It would also be beneficial if you have experience in collaborating with machine suppliers to align their designs with the MES expectations and requirements.**  

  

**You can expect to engage in:**  

  

**Pre-Sales Activities**

* **Initial customer discovery**
* **Understand customer needs on manufacturing area**
* **Work with sales develop customer proposals**

  

**Customer Project Delivery Activities**

* **Act as subject matter expert for MES products**
* **Lead deployment and Integration of customer MES solution**
* **Enhance and streamline customer manufacturing processes**
* **Enhance and streamline customer rollout plan for the MES products**
* **Act as mentor and guide for junior team members**
* **Lead and define MES system design and configuration for new manufacturing lines**
**Your profile**

* **Demonstrated experience and expertise in developing and deploying multi-site MES Solutions, for example with technology vendors like Aveva, Siemens, SAP, Dassault**
* **Proficient in any modern programming language (Golang, Java, Python,.NET, C#…).**
* **At least 10 years of experience working from a Nordic country**
* **Expertise in Industry 4.0 and IT/OT convergence transformations**
* **Experience in applying industry standards like ISA-95**
* **Proven IT development experience as well as experience of multi-cultural project teams, where parts are located off-site**
* **Experience in agile solution deployment is an advantage**
* **University degree, preferably in the fields of computer science, engineering or manufacturing**
* **Good communication skills in English, both orally and written**

  

**Capgemini Engineering Sweden has established a Center of Excellence within Intelligent Operations, pooling experts together, creating a place where we can be inspired, inspire others, coach and be coached, and find a common ground for insights and deliveries. We want you as a Solution Architect to become a part of our team, to help us grow and let the synergies of great talent take us to new levels with our clients and with the rest of Capgemini.**

**We offer you a work environment branded by innovation and a career with freedom, full of learning and development opportunities in a global environment and the support to help you achieve your best. You will be working with the cutting edge of IT and technology, surrounded by dedicated and skilled colleagues with high expertise. We at Capgemini are committed to improving our collective performance by utilizing our inclusive work environment where different talents can thrive, hence diversity and inclusion are important cornerstones for us – which is also proven when we won the "World's Most Ethical Companies (WME) award" nine years in a row as well as other awards and accreditations.**  

  

**#LI-MS8**

**At Capgemini Engineering we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism and innovation. We offer a job with variation that leaves plenty of room for initiative and development. In fact, we are not just offering you a job, we’re inviting you to be part of our community where we will provide you trainings, tools & grounds for professional and personal growth. Each career experience is assorted by an attractive salary package.**

title: Machine Learning Engineer within Advisory and Analytics \u007C SEB
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with a technology function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Are you looking for a meaningful challenge and an opportunity to grow? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!* **About us**
Join our vibrant Data Analytics ART team, which spans Stockholm and Vilnius and works within Google Cloud. We focus on gathering and providing datasets to support customer insights and enhance relationships and experiences. With your expertise, we can unlock even greater possibilities. **Your role:**
As a member of the Data Analytics ART team, you will:* Develop machine learning solutions that drive customer insights and innovation.
* Utilize a diverse tech stack, including Git, Kafka, RESTful APIs, BigQuery, and Vertex AI.
* Apply best practices for continuous integration to manage GCP-deployed products.
* Design innovative technical solutions while engaging in workshops, hackathons, and tech guilds.

 **Required Skills** *Must-have skills:** A background in engineering, computer or data science, or equivalent practical experience in machine learning or data analytics.
* Several years of experience in designing, implementing, and deploying ML models using GCP services like Vertex AI or BigQuery ML.
* Proficiency in Python and bash scripting for automating workflows.
* Proven experience in designing and developing scalable REST APIs for machine learning or data analytics applications.
* Familiarity with Terraform, Docker, and SQL for infrastructure and data management.
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions or GitLab pipelines.
* Hands-on experience working in Linux environments.

 *Nice-to-have Skills** Proficiency in test-driven development and creating a continuous testing platform.
* Experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow for developing deep learning models.
* Familiarity with IT security principles, particularly in the context of ML pipelines and data storage.

  

If you don’t meet every requirement listed but are excited about this role, we encourage you to apply.  

  

**Personal Attributes*** Self-driven and enjoys tackling varied technical challenges.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
* Innovative, curious, and open to starting from scratch.
* A growth mindset, eager to learn and adapt in a rapidly changing technical landscape.

 **What we offer:*** Extensive training and learning opportunities.
* Access to SEB staff banking and exclusive benefits.
* A prestigious team with experienced colleagues who value cooperation and openness.
* Opportunity to share knowledge by pair programming, demos, etc.
* A workplace where we care about the work-life balance.
* An innovative company at the forefront of technology
* Hybrid Workplace Setup
* Extensive training and learning opportunities.

  

Our fundamental belief is that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe in, or where they come from.
**Welcome with your application.**
Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application already today but not later than the 30th of November. If you have questions about the position, please contact Rasmus Hallberg, Talent Acquisition Partner at Rasmus.hallberg@seb.se.

title: BDR Internship - Launch Your Sales & Business Development Career
description:
**Description de l'entreprise**  

Devoteam G Cloud is an award-winning Google Cloud partner renowned for its innovative and collaborative culture. With a team of over 600 Google Cloud experts, we deliver cutting-edge solutions to businesses across the globe. Our Stockholm office is a dynamic hub for technological advancement, and we're looking for driven individuals to join our growing team.

 **Description du poste**  

Are you eager to kickstart your career in sales and business development? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment and enjoy connecting with people? This BDR internship offers an unparalleled opportunity to gain hands-on experience at the forefront of the technology industry.

**As a BDR Intern, you will:**

* **Drive business growth:** Play a key role in identifying and qualifying potential clients, generating leads, and contributing to the company's sales pipeline.
* **Develop key sales skills:** Master the art of outreach, including crafting compelling cold emails and conducting engaging cold calls to connect with prospects.
* **Become a trusted advisor:** Build relationships with potential clients, understand their business challenges, and position Devoteam G Cloud's solutions effectively.
* **Collaborate with sales professionals:** Work closely with our experienced sales team to develop and execute targeted outreach strategies.
* **Contribute to sales strategy:** Participate in sales meetings, contribute to account planning sessions, and gain insights into the sales process from lead generation to close.
* **Gain market intelligence:** Research target industries and identify key decision-makers to expand Devoteam G Cloud's reach.

  

**Qualifications**  

* Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in business, marketing, or a related field.
* Exceptional communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills.
* A strong desire to learn and a passion for sales and business development.
* Self-motivated and results-oriented with a proactive approach.
* Interest in technology and cloud computing is a plus.

  

**Informations supplémentaires** **What You Gain:**

* **Comprehensive sales experience:** Gain valuable experience across all stages of the sales cycle, from lead generation to relationship building and closing deals.
* **Mentorship from sales leaders:** Learn from experienced sales professionals and receive guidance to develop your skills and advance your career.
* **Networking opportunities:** Build connections with industry leaders and expand your professional network within the technology sector.
* **Cutting-edge knowledge:** Gain insight into the world of cloud computing and the latest Google Cloud technologies.
* **Launchpad for your career:** This internship provides a strong foundation for a successful career in sales and business development within a dynamic and growing company.

**Additional Information:**


This is an unpaid internship opportunity based in our Stockholm office.

**Apply Now!**


Submit your CV along with a motivational letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for Devoteam G Cloud and your aspirations for a career in sales and business development.

title: Juniora Analysts till Operations, Engineering, AI & Data (Stockholm) - Aug 2025
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
-----------------------

Deloitte är en globalt ledande leverantör av Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal och Consultative Services. Med mer än 457 000 medarbetare i över 150 länder hjälper vi våra klienter och vår omvärld att lösa komplexa problem och nå högt uppsatta mål. Det som definierar Deloitte är vår strävan efter att göra en meningsfull skillnad. För oss innebär det långsiktig utveckling och resultat för våra klienter och deras företag, idéer och handlingar, som också bidrar till en positiv samhällsutveckling. Det handlar även om att stärka våra medarbetare och främja deras utveckling.


**Om rollen**
-------------

Operations, Engineering, AI & Data stödjer våra klienter i att driva strategiska förändringsprojekt där vi implementerar affärsstrategier och utvecklar deras operationella förmågor för att hjälpa dem nå sina affärsmål. Vi arbetar med verksamhetsförändring där vi använder våra industrispecifika lösningar och tekniska kunskap för att transformera, modernisera och optimera våra klienters processer och tekniska plattformar.


**AI & Data:**

AI & Data-teamet hjälper våra kunder att förbättra beslutsfattande genom datadrivna insikter och skapa insiktsdrivna organisationer. I teamets tekniska spår arbetar vi med implementering av lösningar inom AI, GenAI, cloud data platforms, data warehouse, BI/analytics. Vi har starkt fokus på data science, där kompetenser inom maskininlärning, statistisk analys och modellering är centrala för att leverera avancerade insikter och affärsvärde. Vår modell är on-the-job-training där du växer in i mer ansvarsfulla roller, men du kommer också att vidareutbilda dig i olika tekniska plattformar, t.ex. Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure, Snowflake och/eller Databricks.


Vårt rådgivande spår i teamet jobbar med data management, data governance och datastrategi. Här ser vi gärna att du har en mer traditionell managementkonsultutbildning kombinerad med data och teknik samt ett intresse för att arbeta med rådgivning. AI & Data-teamet verkar i en nordisk organisation med mycket kunskapskapital och kompetens så du kommer också att medverka i projekt, communities och utbildningar tillsammans med dina nordiska kollegor.


**Operations, Industry & Domain Solutions:**

Vi hjälper våra kunder att på ett innovativt sätt förändra sina organisationer. Detta kan innebära att driva större och mindre förändringsprojekt, förnya sin operativa modell, implementera nya system och processer eller förbättra sin effektivitet. Vårt team fokuserar primärt på bank- och försäkring där vi arbetar tillsammans med flertalet av Nordens största banker och försäkringsbolag, samt hälso- och sjukvårdssektorn.


Vi arbetar ofta ihop i projektteam med en stark laganda, där du som Analyst spelar en viktig roll och arbetar nära kunden. Som Analyst kommer du att driva analysarbete, stötta i framtagandet av presentationsmaterial och tillsammans med ditt team hjälpa kunden att lyckas med sin förändringsresa. Du får möjlighet att arbeta nära och lära dig av våra erfarna kollegor om olika industrier och hur man arbetar med affärsutveckling, och inte minst hjälpa våra kunder att adressera spännande tekniska och affärsmässiga utmaningar.


**Engineering:**

Hos Engineering-teamet kommer ditt fokus ligga på att hjälpa våra kunder att transformera sin affär genom planering och implementation av kritiska verksamhetssystem och molnplattformar. Teamet kombinerar teknik- och affärsexpertis inom systemutveckling och molnplattformar med bred projektledningsförmåga samt djup branscherfarenhet inom flera sektorer. Därmed kan vi stödja våra kunder genom hela sin system- och affärstransformationsresa från början till slut oavsett vilken fas de befinner sig i. Vårt erbjudande inkluderar bland annat utveckling av strategier, skräddarsydda plattformar, modernisering av applikationer, alla aspekter av molnteknik samt rådgivning kring alla delar av en systemimplementation.


Som Analyst i vårt team kommer du vara en del av våra kunders resa genom att stötta med roller inom t.ex. kravställning, systemutveckling, testning & projektledning. Du kommer att skaffa dig erfarenhet både genom kundprojekt men även genom att delta vid branschevent, specialiserad utbildning och certifieringsprogram.


**Kravspecifikation**
---------------------

Vi söker dig som är nyexaminerad ingenjör, systemvetare eller ekonom med en masterexamen inom management, data/data science/analytics eller finans. För att trivas bra i rollen bör du även vara utåtriktad och initiativrik samt drivs av nya utmaningar.


Vidare ser vi gärna att du innehar:


* Goda studieresultat, internationell erfarenhet och relevant engagemang vid sidan av studierna
* Relevant arbetslivserfarenhet – erfarenhet från konsultbranschen är meriterande
* Mycket goda språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och tillsammans i ett team, med målmedvetenhet, engagemang och driv
* Intresse för hur digitalisering och ny teknik kan utveckla verksamheter och branscher

Om du är osäker på om du uppfyller ovan kvalifikationer uppmuntrar vi dig att skicka in en ansökan ändå.


**Ytterligare information**
---------------------------

**Vi erbjuder**

Som en del av Deloitte får du tillgång till världens största konsultnätverk med kollegor världen över som du kan nyttja för att utveckla både dig själv, våra klienter och vår verksamhet. Du får arbeta med spännande, komplexa uppdrag, både på global och nordisk nivå, i ett team som alltid värderar ditt perspektiv och som är i framkant av digitaliseringen. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att erbjuda dig möjligheter att driva din personliga utveckling. Vi erbjuder dig praktisk erfarenhet, en personlig coach som långsiktigt stöttar dig i din karriär samt kontinuerlig feedback och support från mer erfarna kollegor.


Du får möjlighet att arbeta i ett företag som hjälper andra aktörer i deras resa mot en mer hållbar organisation, samtidigt som vi arbetar målmedvetet med våra egna ambitioner inom både klimat, miljö och socialt ansvar. Vi ser ett värde i att våra medarbetare har olika erfarenheter vilket främjar nytänkande och bidrar till fler perspektiv.


**Ansökan**

Du ansöker online. Din ansökan ska bestå av:


* CV
* En motivering till;
	+ Varför du är intresserad av Deloitte och rollen
	+ Vad du tror att du kan tillföra i rollen
* Betygskopior från högskola/universitet - De betyg som du laddar upp bör inte vara utdragna senare än 2 månader tillbaka i tiden.

Ladda gärna upp din motivering och dina betyg som ett dokument. CV laddas upp i första steget och de övriga dokumenten som efterfrågas laddas upp när du går vidare till nästa steg (ej i kommentarsfältet). Notera att du behöver ladda upp samtliga dokument för att din ansökan ska ses som fullständig. Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt då vi arbetar med löpande urval. **Om du söker flera tjänster hos oss ber vi dig att i dina ansökningar tydliggöra vilken roll du är mest intresserad av.**

Som ett kvalitativt led i Deloittes rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om våra framtida medarbetare, trygga arbetsmiljön för våra medarbetare och möta regelkrav. Processen för bakgrundskontroller genomförs i samarbete med ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/sv/faq/ . För de tjänster som Deloitte efterfrågar universitetsbetyg genomförs en verifiering som en del i rekryteringsprocessen. För frågor hänvisar vi till ansvarig rekryterare i processen.


**Frågor**

Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller om rekryteringsprocessen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Maria Brengdahl Bengtsson, mbrengdahlbengtsson@deloitte.se .


Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!


**What impact will you make?**

På Deloitte gör ditt arbete en meningsfull skillnad, varje dag, medan du växer i en inkluderande företagskultur av samarbete och hög prestation. Utöver att skapa lösningar strävar vi efter att göra en positiv och avgörande skillnad för andra i vår omgivning, våra klienter och samhället. På Deloitte hittar du tidigare dolda möjligheter att lyckas och inser din fulla potential.


**Arbetsplats**
---------------
company_description: We’re a leading professional services firm, but what makes working at Deloitte unique? When you join us, you become connected. To inspiring people. To meaningful work with fascinating clients.

title: Principal Data Cloud Solution Engineer
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*

Job Category


Sales
Job Details


**About Salesforce**

We’re Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good – you’ve come to the right place.


Delivering customer success with Data + AI + CRM + Trust is the unique value proposition for Salesforce and the Customer 360 Platform.  



  

Salesforce Data Cloud is focused on next-generation technology at Salesforce and the flagship innovation and hyperscale data platform built natively into Salesforce.
  

We are creating a dynamic, constantly evolving environment where expertise in design, and technology is demonstrated every day to drive innovation.  



  

As an SE in Salesforce Data Cloud you will bring a unique combination of executive-level presence combined with full-stack technical skills that ensure Data Cloud delivers value to customers integrated with complex customer data architectures!  



  

**Key Responsibilities**

* Arrange and conduct in-person & web-based meetings to drive the entire opportunity lifecycle from technical discovery to technical close
* Collaborate strategically with Account Executives across the customer base and the sales organization to prioritize and develop Industry-specific use cases grounded in consistent architectures that have proven repeatability with customers
* Implement programs to efficiently scale technical evaluation of Salesforce Data Cloud
* Collaborate with Salesforce product teams to deeply understand Salesforce solutions and roadmap, and advocate for key features needed for success across the Industry/Territory via Voice of the Customer feedback
* Develop scalable, deployable, reusable, and relevant field enablement technical assets that drive differentiated business outcomes in order to accelerate adoption across customers, partners, and sales teams
* Partner with Product Marketing to advise messaging and sales plays across all of Salesforce
* Deliver the overall Salesforce point-of-view for data strategy aligned to industry-specific use cases
* Experience in articulating Data & AI ROI value to Business & getting the IT buy in
* Industry domain experience relevant to Data architecture approaches and knowledge in mapping business capabilities to technical capabilities
* Aware of latest trends in industry including Lakehouses, data governance, LLMs, Agents

  

**Essential Requirements**

* Experience in customer-facing solutioning for Data, Analytics, AI (ML/RAG) and CRM
* Full-stack technical qualifications (CRM, Data Architecture, AI/ML) combined with experience owning technical relationships with C-Level executives
* Experience integrating complex data architectures to drive business value for customers
* Experience in 1 or more Hyperscale Data providers (ex. AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Skilled at guiding impactful discovery conversations to unveil multifaceted client needs and objectives
* Experience driving customer success in large, complex selling organizations
* Persuasive verbal, written, presentation and interpersonal communication skills that inspire change in large organizations
* Fluent in English (+fluent in Nordic language is a pre)

**Preferred Requirements**

* Understanding market trends in consumption selling business and experience in driving consumption through value use cases
* Hands-on expertise in modern cloud data platforms (Snowflake, Databricks, Big Query, RedShift), data analytics tools (Tableau, Looker, Power BI), data programming models (DataFrames, pandas), and AI
* AI: Data Engineering, machine learning, Vector Databases & RAG, MLOps (a plus: Agentic AI and Agents)
* Technical knowledge of the Salesforce platform
* Experience will be evaluated based on alignment to the core competencies for the role (e.g. extracurricular leadership roles, military experience, volunteer work, etc.)

Accommodations


If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .


Posting Statement


At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com .


Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce .
﻿

Salesforce welcomes all.

title: Director & Lead Architect - Large Deal Solutions
description:
* Stockholm, Sweden
* GSH
* 3114050
**Job Description**
-------------------

**Introduction**  

We are building a modern Wipro.  

We are an end-to-end digital transformation partner with the boldest ambitions. To realize them, we need people inspired by reinvention. Of yourself, your career, and your skills. We want to see the constant evolution of our business and our industry. It has always been in our DNA – as the world around us changes, so do we.  

Wipro’s Strategic Solution Center team, and their colleagues in the solution architecture community will transform the way we solution with our clients, creating market-leading, integrated, competitive solutions that differentiate Wipro while also improving the seller experience.
This team is responsible for:* Continuing to build solutions for integrated, multi-service line pursuits, aligning our Lead Architects under one team, working closely with solution architects in the practices and supporting the market units in creating highly tailored, integrated solutions that differentiate Wipro and help them win.
* Transforming the solutioning process to make it more efficient and effective, including the use of Generative AI to improve quality and efficiency, while sharing best practices across Wipro.
* Working closely with the solution architects, practices, delivery organization and design authority community to ensure the solutions they create, together, can be delivered and transitioned smoothly post deal booking.
* Leveraging research, data, improved collateral, and account-based marketing to inform our solution strategy and create delightful buyer experiences.

  

**Role Overview**  

As a large pursuit solution leader at Wipro, you will drive solution blueprinting, solution detailing, estimating, and conducting workshops for large pursuits spanning cross-domain technologies, fostering a collaborative culture, and upholding Wipro's core values. You will also work with the Europe leadership team to qualify deals, develop winning strategies and solution themes.  

As the Solution Architect Lead, you will engage in sales and pre-sales phases of an opportunity pursuit in making targeted presentations, solution workshops and solution response. Engaging with solution architects across technology streams and develop integrated solution and commercial proposition for the pursuit is also critical to the success in this leadership position.  

In this role you will conduct workshops with client and solution teams in co-creating solutions and fine-tuning the solution tenants. You are responsible for the final defence and presentation on the deal. You are expected to develop industry POVs and frameworks to improve positioning and replicate solution approaches. The Solution Architect Lead will also engage in delivery handover during inception phase to deliver strategy and the solution approach, whilst guiding and handing over the project to the execution team. **Roles & Responsibilities:*** Participate in pursuit requirement analysis and gathering workshops and ensure program objectives, business outcomes are converted to solution imperatives.
* Responsible for solution storyline, central winning themes, framework of solution including architecture, technical capabilities, commercial construct.
* Work with SMEs of specialized area to integrate solution in response to client RFP, RFI and proactive pursuits.
* Responsible for the estimate validation and drive response content completeness.
* Formulate best practices and design guidelines for the team.
* Resolves complex design and configuration problems to meet specified objectives.
* Ensures that developed systems meet performance considerations outlined in High Level Design.
* Prepares High Level Designs and collate non-functional requirements
* Guide the team and mentor them as required.

  

**Who we are looking for:*** Bachelor’s In computer engineering or equivalent
* Extensive IT experience with 3+ years’ experience on leading large pursuit solutions.
* Experience in Total outsourcing deals, operating model transformation, digital/cloud/data transformation
* Certified Architect in at minimum one discipline.
* Certification, Knowledge and expertise on Digital & Cloud technologies or Enterprise technologies like ERP, CRM, middle-office, and back-office applications.
* Well-versed in the DevSecOps, Agile methodologies and value stream engineering
* Should have worked 3+ years in pre-sales roles fulltime or part time for large deals more than 70Mn size.
* Experience in managing multiple client accounts, conversations and solutions, as well as sales activities would be an added advantage.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills required – we need someone with executive presence with the ability to articulate a compelling value proposition and complex technical matters in simple terms to non-technical business or sales audience.
* A passionate leader with a growth mindset (our business and our people); empathy and self-awareness.

**Why work at Wipro?**  

We pride ourselves on creating an inclusive workplace that provides equal opportunities to all persons regardless of their age, cultural background, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, disability, veteran status, or anything else. If you only meet some of the requirements for this role, that's okay! We value a diverse range of backgrounds & ideas and believe this is fundamental for our future success. So, if you have the curiosity to learn and the willingness to teach what you know, we'd love to hear from you.  

Besides a competitive salary and benefits package, we are an exciting and dynamic company to work for. The Top Employer Institute ranked Wipro 1st overall in Europe as a “Top Employer” for 2024, we were assessed on several key HR practices including People Strategy, Work Environment, Talent Acquisition, Learning & Development, Wellbeing and Diversity and Inclusion.  

Wipro has been globally recognized by several organizations for our commitment to sustainability, inclusion, and diversity. Social good is in our DNA, we believe in sustainability for the health of our planet, its inhabitants, and our business. For over 75 years we have operated as a purpose-driven company with an unwavering commitment to our customers and our communities. Energized by what we call the Spirit of Wipro, we commit ourselves to being a catalyst for change – working to build a more just, equitable and sustainable society. Around 66% of Wipro’s economic ownership is pledged towards philanthropic purposes.  

All of our employees are expected to embody Wipro’s 5-Habits for Success which are: Being Respectful, Being Responsive, Always Communicating, Demonstrate Stewardship, Building Trust.
  
If you encounter any suspicious mail, advertisements, or persons who offer jobs at Wipro, please email us at **helpdesk.recruitment@wipro.com**. Do not email your resume to this ID as it is not monitored for resumes and career applications.


Any complaints or concerns regarding unethical/unfair hiring practices should be directed to our Ombuds Group at **ombuds.person@wipro.com**
  

  

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, caste, creed, religion, gender, marital status, age, ethnic and national origin, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, political orientation, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.  

  

Wipro is committed to creating an accessible, supportive, and inclusive workplace. Reasonable accommodation will be provided to all applicants including persons with disabilities, throughout the recruitment and selection process. Accommodations must be communicated in advance of the application, where possible, and will be reviewed on an individual basis. Wipro provides equal opportunities to all and values diversity.
company_description: Wipro Limited is a leading technology services and consulting firm focused on building innovative solutions that address clients’ most complex digital transformation needs.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
description:
***Vill du vara med och forma Evidensias digitala framtid och skapa en säker, skalbar och högpresterande molninfrastruktur?***  

*Evidensia söker en engagerad och kunnig Cloud Infrastructure Engineer för att tillsammans med IT-funktionen och verksamheten bygga och förvalta vår molnplattform. I denna roll blir du en nyckelperson för Evidensias digitala initiativ och säkerställer att våra tjänster levererar hög kvalitet och tillförlitlighet till våra användare och kunder. Är du dessutom en person som är kommunikativ och vill ha härliga kollegor omkring dig? Läs vidare och sök jobbet!*

**Om rollen**  

Som Cloud Infrastructure Engineer kommer du att:

* Designa och implementera robusta och skalbara molnlösningar, främst på Azure, i samarbete med IT- och verksamhetsteam
* Säkerställa att våra molnmiljöer uppfyller höga standarder för säkerhet, efterlevnad och prestanda genom kontinuerligt underhåll och optimering
* Implementera lösningar för katastrofåterställning och affärskontinuitet samt optimera molninfrastruktur för kostnadseffektivitet och operativ excellens
* Utveckla policys för molnstyrning, inklusive resursmärkning, åtkomstkontroller och kostnadsoptimering
* Arbeta nära CyberSec-teamet och andra IT-funktioner för att säkerställa hög säkerhet och smidig integrering med befintlig IT-infrastruktur

**Vad erbjuder vi?**  

Evidensia ger dig möjlighet att utvecklas i en dynamisk och stödjande miljö där din expertis verkligen gör skillnad. Du kommer att vara baserad på vårt supportkontor och resor inom norra europa ingår i tjänsten. Bli en del av vår digitala transformation och bygg framtidens molninfrastruktur tillsammans med oss!

**Vem söker vi?**

  

För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi gärna att du har:

* Erfarenhet av att designa, bygga och hantera molninfrastruktur på Azure enligt best practice
* Kunskap om säkerhetsprinciper inom moln, inklusive IAM, kryptering och nätverkssäkerhet
* Erfarenhet av automatisering
* Starka problemlösningsfärdigheter för att hantera komplexa frågor kring molnprestanda och säkerhet
* Erfarenhet av kostnadskontroll och resursstyrning i molnmiljöer
* God förmåga att samarbeta och kommunicera med tvärfunktionella team

**Ort:** Tjänsten baseras på Evidensias Supportkontor i Stockholm. Rollen innebär resor och övernattningar inom regionen (även i andra länder kan förekomma).

 **Sista ansökningsdag:** Intervjuer sker löpande, så snabba på och hör dig till oss!

**För information:**  

Har du frågor om tjänst eller om oss är du välkommen att kontakta CIO/IT-chef Gregor Ålund via mail gregor.alund@evidensia.se.

**Ansök idag och bli en viktig del av Evidensias team där du kan utvecklas och bidra till en trygg och väl fungerande IT-miljö!**

*Evidensia Djursjukvård erbjuder trygg och personlig vård för hundar, katter, exotiska djur och hästar. På lokala djurkliniker och specialiserade djursjukhus i hela Sverige får viktiga familjemedlemmar hjälp med förebyggande friskvård, primärvård, akutvård, avancerad kirurgi och rehabilitering. Varje möte med djur och ägare ska göra skillnad och tillsammans tar våra engagerade medarbetare emot över 500 000 patientbesök per år.* *Tillsammans arbetar vi för att driva den veterinärmedicinska utvecklingen framåt, för djurens bästa varje dag.*
company_description: We are a global leader in veterinary care, dedicated to providing exceptional animal care. Our network of first-opinion practices, referral hospitals, and emergency care centres.

title: Partner Solutions Architect, Consulting Partners
description:
* Significant hands-on implementation or consulting experience and strong knowledge of the software development lifecycle.
* Several years of experience in customer facing roles with a proven record of effective collaborations across multiple internal organizations and interactions with partner and customers.
* Strong communications skills (English and ideally Swedish).
* BA/BS degree required
* Limited travel in the Nordics (up to 40%)


Do you like helping partners solve tough technical problems? Would you like to help some of the best known Systems Integrators in the world utilize cloud computing technologies? Do you have a knack for helping companies understand application architectures and integration approaches? Do you want to be part of the partner solutions architects team helping to establish Amazon Web Services as the leading cloud computing platform?
  
  

As a Partner Solutions Architect within Amazon Web Services (AWS), you will have the opportunity to help shape and deliver on a strategy to build mind share and broad use of Amazon's utility computing web services across the partner community. Your broad responsibilities will include owning the technical engagement with strategic partners. Working backwards from customer business challenges, you will define partner technical enablement strategies which enable our customers and partners to become more successful on AWS.
  
  

The ideal candidate will possess deep technical skills in software architecture and cloud computing as well as customer facing skills at all levels of a partner organization. The ideal candidate should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
As a strategic member of the AWS Partner Solutions Architects team, you will act as a trusted advisor to our managed systems integrators. This includes:
  
  

* Provide the architectural guidance and recommendations necessary to promote successful partner engagements worldwide.
* Assist solution providers with the definition of technical strategies that will enable them to sell more of their offering on the AWS platform.
* Capture and share best-practice knowledge with our broader Solution Architecture community
* Share customer feedback to internal product management and engineering teams to help drive the future of AWS


About the team
  
Diverse Experiences
  
Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
  
  

Why AWS
  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
  
  

Work/Life Balance
  
We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
  
  

Inclusive Team Culture
  
Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
  
  

Mentorship and Career Growth
  
We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
  
  

* Experience working with AWS technologies from a dev/ops perspective
* AWS Certification, eg. AWS Solutions Architect Associate
* Past experience writing and publishing technical whitepapers desirable.
* Experience working with technical communities and technical decision makers.
* Computer Science, Math or Technical background highly desired; Advanced Degree a plus


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

title: Machine Learning Engineer

This is a hybrid role blending data science and software engineering. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining efficient supply chain solutions using cutting-edge technologies and best practices.

title: Consultant, Associate
description:
General information
Country
Sweden


City
Malmo


Job ID
42397


Department
Infor Consulting Services


Description & Requirements
As a **Consultant Associate**, you'll dive into a dynamic role where every day brings new challenges and opportunities. You’ll be at the forefront of **implementing cutting-edge ERP solutions**, helping businesses streamline their operations. Your day-to-day will involve **analyzing business processes**, **collaborating with clients**, and **designing innovative solutions** that make an impact.


This role is perfect for someone who loves problem-solving, working with people, learning, and making a difference in the digital transformation.

  

The daily task of the Consultant Associate consists of:

* Implement ERP solutions
* Analyzing business processes
* Customer interaction
* Designing business solutions
* Participating in and preparing workshops
* Learning new methods of business implementation
* Supporting customer training
* Assisting in go-lives

  

You're a fit for the role if you identify with one or more of the below characteristics:

* A genuine interest in business processes and IT
* Fluent in English and Swedish
* Willingness to travel and a driving license
* Eager to grow and learn
* Enjoy interacting with other people
* Education or knowledge about Supply Chain Managment, Logistics, Manufacturing, Finance or Information Systems


What do we offer?

* Start September 2025
* Full-time permanent contract from day one
* International Onboarding Week in Poland
* A mentor who will help you to navigate the new tasks
* Hands-on experience in customer projects
* Ongoing learning, and career development opportunities
* Work with experienced seniors and with other Early Talents
* Competitive salary from the beginning of your career
* Hybrid type of work
* Office in Stockholm, Malmö and Linköping
* Office activities, wellness benefits, holiday


About The Early Talent Program

  

Project work • Product training • Mentor work • Soft skills training • Customer consulting • Traveling


The program duration is 12 months and consists of both training in our academy and working on projects to provide you with broad hands-on experience to accelerate your career in consulting. Early on in this program, you will help customers to benefit from our world-class Cloud solutions for companies within the Distribution, Food & Beverage, and Manufacturing industries. This will give you a solid foundation in running innovative local and global Infor projects from both an IT and a business perspective in several key business areas.


It's set in an international environment where you will interact with instructors and other Early Talents from EMEA. In addition to training in business processes, applications, and Industry solutions, you will also get an introduction to Infor, our values, and how we operate. All are designed to enable you to learn to innovate, improve, and transform yourself into a skilled consultant.

  


  

About Infor  

Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
For more information visit www.infor.com  


Our Values  

At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.  

We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.  

Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section at the bottom of the infor.com/about/careers webpage.
